answerText: Ernest [Miller] Hemingway[10] The Sun Also Rises follows Jake Barnes, an American journalist working in Paris, who travels to this country to see the festival of San Ferminin Pamplona.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 10 | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author had a highly publicized relationship with the reporter Martha Gellhorn. [10] Name this author of The Sun Also Rises who wrote about his own wartime experiences as an ambulance driver in A Farewell to Arms.
